The by Mpu Monagu·πáa

Metadata of the Edition

  • Title:
  • Text Identifier:

avighnam astu

sa·πÖ hya·πÖ-hya·πÖ pinakƒÅdideva ni karas para kavi makatattva ·πÖ ak·π£ara sa·πÖ sa·πÖkan paran i·πÖ palamba·πÖ atidurlabha kahanan ira n kavƒ´≈õvara sa·πÖ s≈´k·π£m√™* kukus i·πÖ tanah kinikir i·πÖ kuku ri s…ô·∏ç…ô·πÖ i·πÖ a·πÖr…ôg…ôp la·πÖ…ôÃÑ mƒÅyƒÅkƒÅra vinimba nitya sinamƒÅdhi* manurunana ca·πá·∏çi pustaka 1
